1.title: Hack the tao
1.description: Hack the Tao is the first art game experience designed by the Italian artist duo, Hackatao, for The Sandbox Game

2.title: Shinytures: Finding The Lost Creatures
2.description: Shinytures: Finding The Lost Creatures it’s an adventure where you can get mesmerized by accomplishing the missions you are giving as a member of the spatial organization.

3.title: Viking Fjord
3.description: Enter into the Vikings atmosphere as a real explorer. Our players have been traveling back in time to experience Fjord´s life.

4.title: Dethrone
4.description: Dethrone is a fantasy RPG adventure game where the player’s mission is to restore order in the region by completing missions given by the mysterious sovereign.

5.title: Mushroom Mania
5.description: Mushroom Mania is a collect-a-thon platformer set in an oversized fantasy mushroom world.

6.title: Tombs of Treasures
6.description: Tombs of Treasures is an action platform-adventure walking simulator. In the game, the adventurer Liu Fogel arrives in the jungle to find the treasures.

7.title: Sweet village
7.description: This is Rex. Many legends were told by ancient yummy bears but certainly, nobody could answer how Rex got into this candy world. Who knows, maybe he ate too many candies and showed up here.

8.title: 3D Print your life
8.description: Have you ever tried a 3D printer? Based on the CNC concept (Computer Numerical Control) a 3D printer helps you to build solid objects. 3D printing has been around for several years but only in more recent years has it become more accessible for everyday people.

assetAuction.priceDisclaimerSell: A 5% in terms of commissions for The Sandbox will be added to the price of your asset once put on sale.

buy.title: Buy now!
buy.about: ETH will be used to pay the necessary amount of Gas, it will affect the price depending on the transaction speed.

balance.noLandsText: You have lost the Land that allows you to enjoy all the Pre-Season content. You need to have a Land to unlock it

community.title: 커뮤니티에 참여하기
community.description1: 저희 놀라운 커뮤니티의 일원이 되어보세요. 가장 빠르게 소식을 확인하실 수 있습니다.

createAvatarModal.title: Get your very own LAND NFT
createAvatarModal.description: Head over to OpenSea and discover a wide range of LANDs and NFTs for sale.

meta.title: The Sandbox Game - User-Generated Crypto & Blockchain Games
meta.description: Take your creative freedom to the next level in The Sandbox. Monetize your voxel art in the blockchain! Create & Play!
meta.keywords: sandbox, voxel art, 3D voxel game, voxel artists, 3D online PC game, community, blockchain dapp, PC voxel game, PC voxel art, decentralized game

og.title: A Decentralized Gaming Platform Made By Players
og.description: The Sandbox is a decentralized community-driven gaming ecosystem for creators to monetize voxel assets and gaming experiences in the blockchain!

twitter.title: A Decentralized Gaming Platform Made By Players.
twitter.description: The Sandbox is a decentralized community-driven gaming ecosystem for creators to monetize voxel assets and gaming experiences in the blockchain!
twitter.card: A Decentralized Gaming Platform Made By Players.
twitter.creator: @thesandboxgame

header.title: 오신 것을 환영합니다
header.description: Play, Create, Own, and Govern a virtual world made by players

discover.title: Discover The Sandbox
discover.description: The Sandbox is a virtual world where players can play, build, own, and monetize their virtual experiences. We empower artists, creators, and players to build the platform they always envisioned, providing the means to unleash your creativity.

nft.title: NFTs
nft.description: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable - allowing true digital ownership of in-game assets.

land.title: CREATE IN YOUR OWN LAND
land.description: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable - allowing true digital ownership of in-game assets.

sand.title: Why SAND ?
sand.description: $SAND is our main utility token that allows you to buy and sell LANDS and ASSETS in The Sandbox metaverse.

snoopDogg.title: From tha streets 2 tha Sandbox
snoopDogg.paragraph1: Snoop Dogg is entering the Metaverse
snoopDogg.paragraph2: Get your Snoop Dogg Private Party Pass and get access to his mansion

meta.title: The Sandbox Metaverse Map
meta.description: The Sandbox Metaverse is made up of LAND, which are parts of the world, owned by players to create and monetize experiences. Buy it here.
meta.keywords: sandbox, map, metaverse, land, world, experiences, create, monetize, sand, own land, create games

loader.text8: Did you know? LANDS can be combined to form ESTATES to create bigger game experiences.
loader.text9: Did you know? You’ll be able to rent and sell your game experiences within The Sandbox
loader.text10: GEMS are the tokens that define your ASSETS attributes just as Power and Defense
loader.text11: Did you know? The Creator Fund’s artists are responsible for creating the ASSETS in The Sandbox.
loader.text12: You can create and sell your own ASSETS using VoxEdit, our free voxel editor.

detail.signIn: Sign In to enable more features
detail.reachOut: How to reach out your Neighbours
detail.askSellMarket: Do you want sell this Land in our Market?

onboarding.title: Sandbox Map
onboarding.slide1: Navigate the Sandbox map to find the LANDS and ESTATES of our upcoming playable metaverse. Make sure to set your wallet with SAND to get yourself a piece of the Sandbox.
onboarding.slide2: We are holding a series of special lunar-themed LAND presales beginning this June 4th through July 2nd. Get a hold of one of the 7,254 LANDS of this MoonSale at a 20% discount and get ready to join the metaverse.

play.legend: Get your LAND to create your own experience

alpha.title: Welcome to the TSB internal Alpha!
alpha.description: The Metaverse is slowly opening its door and we are counting on you to help us make it the crypto-place-to-be! You can earn 1000 SANDs by filling up our feedback form here ! We hope you will have a great time!

sidebarRight.noProgress: You do not have progress to claim
sidebarRight.noUnlocked: There are no unlocked experiences yet
sidebarRight.scheduleText: Click on days to see new experience releases & scheduled social events rewarding SAND!

slide1.title: Welcome!
slide1.description: Let me show you around! Are you ready to start?

slide2.title: Select an Experience
slide2.description: Click on an experience on the map to see its details.

slide3.title: Ready to Play
slide3.description: Click on 'More details' if you want to find out more, or press 'Play' to jump into the game!

pass.dontOwn: You don't own a season pass.

loading.title: The Sandbox is loading now..
loading.description: Get ready to enter the Metaverse !

download.title: It's time to play The Sandbox!

thanks.title: Thanks for playing The Sandbox
thanks.step1: Click to run The Sandbox installer.
thanks.step3: Click in “Finish” to end the install process.

season.totalDescription: Each player can win up to 1,000 SAND.
season.outTitle: Do you want to get these rewards?
season.outDescription: You need a Season Pass to join the Alpha. One of the Season Pass winners might put theirs for sale on OpenSea.
season.howToTitle: How to level up and earn rewards
season.howToDescription: Complete the levels by visiting experiences in the metaverse and earn rewards! Check the
season.howToDescription3: to know where to go and when new experiences are released.

rewards.description: You must have a Season Pass in your inventory to claim the rewards at the end of the Alpha
rewards.getAChance: Get a chance to be one of the firsts to play and earn in the Alpha! Registering to win a Season Pass
rewards.seasonOverDescription: Congratulations! In a while you will be able to claim all your earned rewards.

pass.text1: - LANDs owners can register for a lottery to win one of the 1000 Season Pass NFT available.
pass.text2: - If a lottery winner decides to sell their Season Pass, anybody can buy it on OpenSea.
pass.text3: - Anybody with a Season Pass can participate!

revealed.text1: - Discover formidable experiences, new ones are released everyday!
revealed.text2: - Complete objectives by exploring the metaverse!
revealed.text3: - Participate in scheduled Social Events and get a chance to win Extra Rewards!
revealed.text4: - Meet other players and make new friends!

journey.text3: - Extra Rewards during scheduled Social Events

levelUp.line1: Claim the rewards at the end of The Season

seasonCompleted.title: Completed all season levels!
seasonCompleted.line1: Claim the rewards at the end of The Season

seasonLocked.title: Season Pass is locked
seasonLocked.subtitle: You need to own the following NFTs to unlock the content
seasonLocked.text1: Owning that NFTS unlocks the Season Pass Rewards.
seasonLocked.text2: You need to keep it to continue enjoying this content, separating from the NFTs will cause you to lose access to the content.
seasonLocked.text3: Some of them might be for sale on the marketplace depending on if some users are willing to part with it

seasonOver.claimAll: Now you can claim all your unlocked rewards

shop.title: 상점에 오신 것을 환영합니다
shop.subtitle: 상점은 더 샌드박스의 마켓플레이스로 애셋을 선택하고 SAND 토큰으로 구매하여 LAND에서 사용할 수 있습니다.
shop.noCopies: No copies available for sale at the moment

create.title: 애셋 만들기
create.text1: 크리에이터가 애셋을 만들때에 포인트를 활용하여 속성을 업그레이드 할 수 있습니다.
create.text2: 크리에이터는 애셋을 만들때의 속성의 양을 변경할 수 있습니다.
create.text3: 게임 메이커가 업데이트되면, 기존의 속성을 유지하거나 새로운 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.

values.3: 각 게임의 설명에서 사용되는 속성을 확인할 수 있습니다.

values.1: 속성 프리셋과 게임에서의 사용과 연관되어 있습니다
values.2: 애셋은 게임 사용되기 위해서는 필수 속성이 필요합니다
values.3: 크리에이터들은 게임의 필요에 따라 속석을 변경할 수 있습니다.

create.text4: 이러한 시스템은 플레이어와 게이머를 위해 유동적입니다. 크리에이터들은 원할 때 게임을 수정할 수 있고, 크리에이터들은 게게임 입장에 제한받지 않습니다.

cart.title: Shopping cart
cart.added: has been successfully added to your cart
cart.removed: has been successfully removed to your cart
cart.description: Add items to your cart and start to buy!

notes.text1: * The price and availability of items at The Sandbox are subject to change. The Cart is a temporary place to store a list of your items and reflects each item's most recent price.
notes.text2: * When buying multiple assets, you might need to confirm each asset individually on your wallet.

assets.noGems: This asset doesn't have any gems.
assets.inRange: Attributes will go in a range. They will be assigned a final number after minting.

meta.title: Build your own games in The Sandbox
meta.description: The Sandbox offers a unique way to create, assemble and share 3D voxel models. Make your own 3D voxel objects, animate them, and publish/sell them in our worldwide marketplace, for free!

header.title: Craft your game. Coding not required
header.description: The toolbox you need for your imagination to come to life

metaverse.title: Building games for the Metaverse
metaverse.description: Anyone can build 3D games for free. No coding required. Contribute to a vast metaverse, filled with amazing creations and experiences.

1.title: Create for free
1.description: Create awesome 3D games for free using thousands of voxel models (NFTs) made by the community with VoxEdit.

2.title: Build And Share
2.description: It's just as fun to build your game as it is to play. Share in the gallery to your friends and make something they will remember forever.

3.title: No Code Required
3.description: Easy to learn. Creating behaviors and editing attributes are simple and intuitive

play.title: Play-to-Earn
play.description: Free-to-play는 과거의 이야기입니다… 더 샌드박스와 함께 이제 게임을 통해 수익을 창출할 수 있습니다. Earn-to-play를 통해 플레이어와 크리에이터는 다양한 활동에 대한 보상을 받을 수 있습니다. 저희 보상은 가상 현실에 국한되지 않고 현실 가치가 있기에, 플레이와 만들기에 대한 강한 동기부여를 제공합니다.

text.bits: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

meta.title: The Sandbox - VoxEdit
meta.description: Create, animate, and play in The Sandbox. VoxEditor is the first software that allows you to create your own voxel models, rig them, and animate them in no time.
meta.keywords: sandbox, voxeditor, voxedit, voxel editor, voxel art, 3D voxel game, voxel artists, voxel game art, voxel market, blockchain dapp, PC voxel game, PC voxel art

og.description: Create, animate, and play in The Sandbox. VoxEditor is the first software that allows you to create your own voxel models, rig them, and animate them in no time.

header.title: VoxEdit - NFT Creator
header.description: The leading software that allows you to create, rig, and animate your own voxel-based NFTs. Sell them on The Sandbox's marketplace and discover a new world.

cards.1: 모델을 업로딩 하기 위해 먼저 '크리에이터 펀드' 를 통해 승인된 아티스트가 되야합니다. 오늘 신청하세요 :
cards.2: 마켓플레이스에 애셋 업로딩은 '복스에딧' 으로만 가능합니다. 복스에딧을 다운 받고 애셋을 만들어보세요 :
cards.3: 모델을 완성한 후 다음 방법으로 마켓플레이스에 업로딩 할 수 있습니다. 파일 > 내보내기 > 마켓플레이스로 내보내기 > 썸네일 선택 후, 모델 정보 입력

1.title: Modeler
1.description: 상상력을 총동원하세요! 초보에서 전문가까지 누구나 쉽게 제공되는 툴과 유저 친화적 인터페이스를 활용하여 멋진 작품을 만들 수 있습니다.

2.title: Animator
2.description: 복셀 창작 세계의 게임 체인저입니다. 저희 스켈레톤 시스템을 통해 누구나 쉽게 자신의 작품에 애니메이션을 추가할 수 있습니다. 키프레이밍을 사용하여 무엇이든 애니메이션해보세요

3.title: NFT Maker
3.description: Sell, trade, and buy VoxEdit assets on The Sandbox's marketplace and monetize your creations. 95% of all transactions goes to you, the creator!

0.text: “모델링과 아니메이션 기능을 모두 지원하는 복스에딧은 놀랍습니다.”
0.author: William Santacruz

1.text: “복스에딧은 스켈레톤 리깅 및 타임라인 애니메이션을 동시에 제공하는 만큼 복셀 아티스트들에게 매우 유용할 것입니다”
1.author: Alex Florez

2.text: “헌신적인 팀과 함께 올바른 방향으로 개발이 되고 있습니다. 온전히 기능하는 애니메이션 시스템을 통해 다른 소프트웨어들과 차별됩니다!”
2.author: Zach Soares

3.text: “복셀 아트로 애니메이션을 만들기 가장 쉬우 툴입니다. 초보자들도 쉽게 사용할 수 있도록 심플하고 사용하기 쉬운 인터페이스를 제공합니다.”
3.author: Nicolas Morrone

play.title: 규칙으로 플레이!
play.text1: 영향력이 커지면 큰 책임도 같이 져야합니다. 가장 중요한 것은 규칙을 따라 우리의 제약 조건을 준수하는 것입니다!
play.text2: 기본 크기는 sandbox 유니버스에서 Meter (3,2 f)로 변환되는 32*32*32이며 캐릭터와 자산은 이 크기를 준수해서 제작되어야 합니다. 이 세부사항을 모두 사용할 필요는 없으나 32x32x32는 큐빅 미터 내에서 만들기 위한 최대입니다.
play.text3: 아바타 제작 : 게임에서 사람 캐릭터 평균이 1.80 미터(5,9) 라면 제작물은 32*32*32의 2개 큐브의 높이를 기반으로 생성되어야 합니다.

funding.title: 2백만 달러짜리 크리에이터 펀드 소개
funding.subtitle: 당사의 플랫폼에서 귀하의 복셀 창작물을 만들고, 공유하며 판매하는 것을 도와드리고 싶습니다:

cards.1: 먼저, 우리가 귀하의 작품을 평가하여 할 수 있도록 가입을 해 주십시오
cards.2: 귀하의 작품이 최고의 복셀 자산이 될 수 있도록 자산별로 $10부터 $1,000까지 보조금이 지급됩니다
cards.3: 이 펀드의 전반적인 목표는 게임용 voxel 자산을 10,000개 생성하는 것입니다
cards.4: 물론 이 보그금 이외에도 Sandbox가 출시되면 플레이어에게 작품을 판매할 수 있습니다

funding.text: 이 프로그램의 자산은 1,000 개까지만 제한되어 있으니 이 혜택을 놓치시지 않으려면 바로 가입하세요!

header.title: The Sandbox Avatar
header.description: Customize your look, boost it with equipment and get ready to play with your friends in The Sandbox metaverse.

1.title: Create your style
1.description: Quickly combine different outfits, hairstyles and colors to get a unique look.

2.title: Get Social
2.description: Meet with friends and socialize with thousands of players in The Sandbox virtual world.

3.title: Equip your avatar and Play
3.description: Boost your attributes with equipment and get ready to play.

section2.title: Select an avatar
section2.subtitle: Find your own style to stand out from the crowd
section2.description: Get started easily with a predesigned avatar. Choose between more than 20 models designed by our best artists and join The Sandbox metaverse !

section3.title: Customize your Avatar
section3.description: Quickly combine different outfits, hairstyles and colors to create a unique style

section4.title: Socialize into the virtual world
section4.description1: Meet and interact with thousands of users with different styles. Explore, discover and play with them in the virtual lands of The Sandbox.
section4.description2: Become who you truly are: the possibilities are endless.

section5.title: Boost your Avatar’s attributes with Equipment
section5.subtitle: Coming soon

part1.title: Equip your avatar and get special skills.
part1.text1: All avatars come with a specific set of Attributes that define their abilities in
part1.text2: Power, Luck, Defense, Speed and Magic.
part1.text3: Want a stronger avatar? Visit the
part1.text4: and choose the right weapon from thousands of options created by the Community. They will soon become available.

part2.title: Create custom Equipment with VoxEdit
part2.description: Equipment are Tokens that can be traded. They have Catalysts and Gems just as other assets do. Yes, you can also create and mint Equipment through VoxEdit !

section6.title: What are you waiting for ?
section6.description: Join the Community of thousands of users that have already registered in TheSandbox with their unique avatars.

paragraphs.1: Intrigued? Create your account from the main menu to begin exploring everything that The Sandbox blockchain game has to offer. See what other players like you have created. Become inspired, purchase SAND (the game’s money), buy LAND, and let your creative side take over. The Sandbox is only just beginning, and you can be part of the journey ahead.

header.title: LANDS

There will only ever be 166,464 LANDs available, which can be used to host games, build multiplayer experiences, create housing, or offer social experiences to the community

sandbox.title: What is THE SANDBOX?

play.title: Play-to-Earn

sandbox.name: The Sandbox
sandbox.description: The Sandbox is a virtual world built on the Ethereum blockchain, where players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experience

sand.name: $SAND
sand.description: The SAND token is an ERC-20 utility token that is used for value transfers as well as staking and governance.

voxedit.title: VoxEdit
voxedit.description: Software to create voxel ASSETS, which can then become Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and be imported to the Marketplace.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.description: A visual scripting toolbox that allows anyone to build 3D games for free.

gameMaker.title: Game Maker
gameMaker.description: A visual scripting toolbox that allows anyone to build 3D games for free.

sandbox.title: What is "The Sandbox" (SAND)
sandbox.text1: The Sandbox is a virtual world where players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experiences on the Ethereum blockchain using the platform’s utility token SAND.Players can create digital assets in the form of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), upload them to the marketplace, and integrate into games with Game Maker.
sandbox.text2: A LAND is a digital piece of real estate in The Sandbox metaverse that players can buy to build experiences on top of. Once player owns a piece of LAND, the player will be able to populate it with games and ASSETS. Multiple LANDs can be combined to form an ESTATE.
sandbox.text3: A total of 166,464 LANDs will ever be available, contained in a map that will form The Sandbox metaverse.
sandbox.text4: GEM and CATALYST defines the tier, scarcity, and attributes of ASSET. CATALYST adds empty sockets to the NFTs that can be filled with GEMs. The higher the quality of the CATALYST, the more sockets your ASSET will have.
sandbox.text5: Users can monetize their time on the platform, keeping 95% of SAND as revenue share by :

1.title: Selling ASSETS
1.description: Users can create and sell ASSETS on the marketplace as NFTs.

2.title: Owning a LAND
2.description: Buy a LAND in one of the LAND sales. Players can then rent them or populate them with content to increase the LAND's value.

3.title: Building Games on the Game Maker
3.description: Build and monetize games using the Game Maker on the LANDs that are owned by players.

sandbox.text6: Through the use of ERC-1776, The Sandbox allows platform users to initate transactions on the Ethereum blockchain while transaction gas fees are paid by the platform, optimizing overall user experience.
sandbox.text7: 50% of all SAND transaction volume, collected from LAND sales, Premium NFT sales, transaction fees and subscription services is going to the Foundation
sandbox.text8: The Foundation supports the ecosystem of The Sandbox, contributing to the growth of awareness about NFTs, Metaverse, and $SAND adoption.
sandbox.text9: The Foundation currently is involved with

foundation.1: Managing the Game Makers Fund and Creators Fund, offering grants to incentivize high quality content and game production in The Sandbox.
foundation.2: Funcing over 17 game projects, some of which have been unveiled to the public at https://www.sandbox.game/game/top
foundation.3: Distributing grants to 100 artists to produce NFTs, most of which can be seen at http://www.sandbox.game/shop
foundation.4: Supporting local community managers to grow awareness around the globe about The Sandbox, NFTs and blockchain gaming via our Community Rewards and Ambassadors program https://medium.com/sandbox-game/the-sandbox-ambassador-program-4f00bb5c9c24
foundation.5: Sponsoring prizes to the various contests organized by The Sandbox team (VoxEdit Contests and Game Jams) to stimulate the creativity of users around the world and get them to engage with the tools of our platform.
foundation.6: Supporting play-to-earn tournaments and cross-gaming with activities that encourage the broader adoption of SAND.

OnboardingMap.subtitle: Welcome to the
OnboardingMap.title: Sandbox Map
OnboardingMap.slide02: Navigate the Sandbox map to find the LANDS and ESTATES of our upcoming playable metaverse. Make sure to set your wallet with SAND to get yourself a piece of the Sandbox.
OnboardingMap.slide03: We are holding a series of special lunar-themed LAND presales beginning this June 4th through July 2nd. Get a hold of one of the 7,254 LANDS of this MoonSale at a 20% discount and get ready to join the metaverse.

onSale.readText: Read the whole article in our Medium channel.
onSale.text: 애셋 프리세일 동안 보유하고 있는 LAND에 사용될 수 있는 특별한 애셋들을 구매할 수 있습니다.
onSale.leftText: 애셋은 복셀 아티스트들이 VoxEdit을 사용하여 만든 복셀 모델입니다. 애셋은 유저 제작 컨텐츠로 NFT화되어 블록체인에 업로딩 됩니다. 애셋들은 게임 아이템으로서 LAND에서 활용이 됩니다.

zero.title: Liquidity Mining
zero.paragraph1: The Sandbox is a virtual world where players can play, build, own, and monetize their virtual experiences.. You can also Invert your crypto currency and earn more SAND

first.title: DISCOVER THE SANDBOX
first.paragraph1: The Sandbox is a virtual world where players can play, build, own, and monetize their virtual experiences. We empower artists, creators, and players to build the platform they always envisioned, providing the means to unleash your creativity.

second.title: BECOME A LAND OWNER
second.paragraph1: A LAND is a piece of The Sandbox metaverse, providing access to exclusive content as well as granting the possibility to monetize your own part of The Sandbox’s Metaverse. Build experiences, host events, invite friends.

third.title: WHY SAND?
third.paragraph1: $SAND is our main utility token that allows you to buy and sell LANDS and ASSETS in The Sandbox metaverse.

fourth.title: NFT
fourth.paragraph1: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable - allowing true digital ownership of in-game assets.

privacyPolicy.title: Bacasable  Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.text1: GDPR – Privacy-By-Design and Record of Processing Activities
privacyPolicy.text2: We are committed to a lawful, fair and transparent processing of personal data, adhering to the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).This privacy policy documents our general privacy-by-design considerations (articles 5, 25 and 26 GDPR) and records our processing activities (article 30(1) GDPR). This privacy policy describes the type of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you visit the website
privacyPolicy.text3: , all platforms and services offered thereon, and through our mobile applications (collectively, our “Website”) and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.
privacyPolicy.text4: Company name: BACASABLE Global Limited Address Unit 418, Level 4, Cyberport 1, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong, Mail: privacy@sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text5: * Not formally a DPO under the GDPR. Note that the below uses the “you” and “us” pronouns in paragraphs nrs. 1 o 11 to allow inclusion without modification in our information notices provided to data subjects.
privacyPolicy.text6: Our Website is not intended for children under 18 years of age. No one under age 18 may provide any personal information to or on the Website. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you are under 18, do not use or provide any information on this Website or on or through any of its features/register on the Website, make any purchases through the Website, use any of the interactive or public comment features of this Website or provide any information about yourself to us, including your name, address, telephone number, email address, or any screen name or user name you may use. If we learn we have collected or received personal information from a child under 18 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under 18, please contact us at privacy@sandbox.game.
privacyPolicy.text7: 1. We process the following (categories of) personal data When you play our games, interact with or participate in our gaming platforms, connect to a social networking site through our games, register an account, enter a promo code, or place an order, we process the following personal data:
privacyPolicy.text8: Your IP address, your SIM code, and the country where you are located. Your device type (for example, PC or Mac, iPhone 7, Samsung Galaxy S7) and operating system version.
privacyPolicy.text9: For analytics, most, when you installed and played the game, your progress throughout the game, and events that are connected to your game-play. We generally cannot identify you with this data, but treat it the same as personal data.
privacyPolicy.text10: 2. What (purposes) do we use the data for We use this personal data to perform analytics for our games and allow third-parties to sell, buy and deliver advertising in those games that display advertising. We use your IP address and SIM code to comply with legal obligations, specifically to comply with VAT reporting obligations
privacyPolicy.text11: We use social network data to show you personalized content and synchronise your online progression across multiple devices. For example, we might show a list with only your friends in it, or show your name or avatar on an in-game object.
privacyPolicy.text12: We use your email address that you provided when you signed up for our newsletter to send you the newsletter
privacyPolicy.text13: 3. What is our legal basis for the processing For both analytics and advertising we base the processing of personal data on the legitimate interest of TSBMV GLOBAL LTD. For analytics, this is our ability to analyze how players progress through our games to make them better, and to know our player-base on an aggregate level. For advertising, this is our ability to be able to off-set development costs and risk with advertising income. We also process your personal data for the legitimate business interest of complying with a legal obligation -- we are subject to certain legal requirements which may require us to process your personal data. We may also be obliged by law to disclose your personal data to a regulatory body or law enforcement agency. For the third-parties we use, their legitimate interest is to be able to offer us their services, and for advertising third-parties and advertisers to be able to show you advertising.
privacyPolicy.text14: 4. Where do we obtain the data from (sources) We obtain data from you (when you provide it directly through the Website) and from our third-party services providers:
privacyPolicy.text19: 5. How long and where do we store data We store the personal data that we collect for up to 5 years, and only aggregate data after that time. Aggregation data means that we can no longer look at data for individual players. We store the data with our third-party services provider, Amazon AWS. When a third-party service provider is a controller, they may keep data as well, either for a shorter or longer period.
privacyPolicy.text20: 6. What safeguards have we taken to protect data Taking into account the nature, scope, context and purpose of the processing, we have taken the following technical and organizational measures:
privacyPolicy.text21: Access to our database and user accounts with third-party service providers is protected with access control.
privacyPolicy.text22: Access to the database is limited, not all staff in our organization have full access.
privacyPolicy.text23: Data sent from our games is encrypted in transit where technically possible. We do not actively monitor the security of our databases and need to rely on our processors to notify us of any data breaches.
privacyPolicy.text24: 7. Who we share data with We may disclose aggregated data and any information that does not identify an individual without restriction.
privacyPolicy.text25: We may also disclose personal information that we collect or you provide:
privacyPolicy.text27: To contractors, service providers, and other third parties we use to support our business.
privacyPolicy.text28: To a buyer or other successor in the event of a merger, reorganization, dissolution, or other transfer or sale of some or all of TSBMV Global Ltd.’s assets.
privacyPolicy.text29: To fulfill the purposes for which you provide it.
privacyPolicy.text30: For any other purpose disclosed by us when you provide the information.
privacyPolicy.text32: We share data with the following third-parties. These are either controllers, or processors acting on our behalf. We have linked to their respective policies and given a basic description of what they do:
privacyPolicy.text33: We may also disclose your personal information:
privacyPolicy.text34: To comply with any court order, law, or legal process, including to respond to any government or regulatory request.
privacyPolicy.text35: To enforce or apply our Terms of Use and other agreements, including for billing and collection purposes.
privacyPolicy.text36: If we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to protect the rights, property, or safety or TSBMV Global Ltd., our end users, or others.
privacyPolicy.text37: 8. Transfer of your personal data You should also know that your personal data may be transferred from your home country to third parties. If you are an EU resident, this could imply that we also transfer data to countries that do not offer an adequate level of protection for your personal data. When we transfer this data, we will do so only when we have put in place appropriate safeguards to protect your personal data. Please contact us to get a copy of the safeguards that we have put in place. Our contact details are at the end of this privacy policy.
privacyPolicy.text38: 9. Your Rights You have the right to request access to your personal data that we process. You also have the right to:
privacyPolicy.text39: Rectify incorrect personal data or erase it in certain circumstances.
privacyPolicy.text40: Restrict or object to the processing of your personal data.
privacyPolicy.text41: Receive your data so that you can use it elsewhere (data portability).
privacyPolicy.text42: If you wish to exercise any of the above rights, please send us an email at privacy@sandbox.game. You may also update your personal data in your profile on The Sandbox via the settings. Finally, you have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. If you do not know who your supervisory authority is, please contact us and we will tell you.
privacyPolicy.text43: 10. How to contact us You can contact us with any questions you may have about the processing of your personal data or the use of cookies and similar technologies by us, or to exercise the above rights: Web: http://www.sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text44: Company name: BACASABLE Global Limited Address Unit 418, Level 4, Cyberport 1, 100 Cyberport Road, Hong Kong, Mail: privacy@sandbox.game
privacyPolicy.text45: 11. Version information: We last updated this notice on August 28, 2020. You can view it at

collectionsPage.acceptedFormat: The accepted image formats are PNG and JPG. The file size should be less than 2mb.
collectionsPage.coverImage: You should upload a cover image for this collection. The accepted formats are PNG and JPG.
collectionsPage.iconImage: You should upload an icon for this collection. This will appear on the marketplace sidebar. The accepted format is PNG.

login.refresh: Please refresh your browser after plugin's installation
login.sub-choose: You dont have a wallet installed, select one to continue

bannerTop.title: Snoop Dogg
bannerTop.paragraph1: Snoop Dogg is building his mansion inside The Sandbox and YOU are invited to the party!
bannerTop.paragraph2: Play ball, watch movies, and chill by the pool.
bannerTop.paragraph3: Visit Snoop Dogg's mansion and check out the Doggfather's NFTs.

loginVIP.title: Your VIP Party Pass
loginVIP.descriptionRegular1: The Snoop Private Party Pass token gives you access to step into Snoop Dogg's lifestyle. With the Party Pass, you can attend Snoop's private metaverse party and get access to exclusive NFTs.

loginVIPNow.descriptionRegular1: is a limited token which gives you access to step into Snoop Dogg's lifestyle. With the Party Pass, you can attend Snoop's private metaverse party and get access to exclusive NFTs, priceless experiences, and a chance to have Snoop Dogg perform an exclusive concert on your LAND. There will only ever be 1,000 passes available, create your account now to get your pass.

bannerMiddle.subtitle1: a virtual world made by players
bannerMiddle.paragraph1: Play experiences both single-player and multi-player. Create and animate assets with Voxedit 3D. Build unique game experiences at The Sandbox Metaverse with the Game Maker tool. Buy and Sell assets at the Marketplace to enhance your experience.
bannerMiddle.paragraph6: In The Sandbox, the only limit is your imagination.
bannerMiddle.subtitle2: the world of Snoop Dogg like never before.
bannerMiddle.paragraph2: Alongside Snoop’s mansion and hang out with friends, old and new!
bannerMiddle.paragraph3: You will have the chance to become Snoop Dogg himself, thanks to hand-crafted voxel Avatars that can be used in The Sandbox metaverse!

1.text: Have an account at The Sandbox.

2.text: There are three ways to obtain one of the 1,000 Party Passes:

list.1: - Purchase one of 212 Premium LANDS in the upcoming Snoop LAND sale.
list.2: - Purchase one of 650 passes sold on our Marketplace.
list.3: - Be a lucky winner of 138 given away during our airdrops.

3.text: Join The Sandbox Discord and get access to the Snoop Dogg VIP Channel.

footer.title: Follow us.
footer.text: Based on the comic book The Walking Dead by Robert Kirkman, Tony Moore and Charlie Adlard. The Walking Dead is a registered or otherwise protected trademark owned by Robert Kirkman, LLC. Skybound is a registered or otherwise protected trademark owned by Skybound, LLC. Uses with permission.

banner.title: Alpha Season
banner.subtitle: Playing the
banner.description: First glance at the Metaverse and on all the wonderful things you, the player will be able to create and host on your LAND. Welcome!

topInfos.title: The Sandbox
topInfos.paragraph: The Sandbox is a virtual world where players can build, own, and monetize their gaming experiences and assets inside an immense virtual world. The Sandbox offers a suite of tools, tailor-made to empower players to come together and create engaging experiences across the metaverse.

intro.title: The sandbox is very happy to release its first closed Alpha!
intro.description: Please remember the ecosystem is still work in progress so you might still find some fresh paint and bugs. Our main goals are to test our servers infrastructure, social management and user flow. Please help us improve the experience by providing feedback on our website in the Alpha section.
intro.subtitle: Have fun

alpha.title: Alpha Season
alpha.subtitle: How does it work, waht can we do and what do we earn? We tell you everything!

1.subtitle: OWN A LAND AND REGISTER TO THE LOTTERY

paragraphs.1: The Alpha Season is open for holders of the Season Pass NFT ticket.
paragraphs.2: Take part in the lottery to try to win one of the 1000 tickets available. To participate you just need to own a Land and to be registered. You don’t have a Land?
paragraphs.3: You haven’t won the lottery? The Season Pass is an NFT that can be traded on Opensea!

2.subtitle: WON A TICKET? PLAY THE ALPHA

paragraphs.1: Explore, Dance, Chat, Play and more activities await you.
paragraphs.2: During the 31 days of the Alpha Season, come and discover 15 extraordinary new experiences gradually released.
paragraphs.3: Meet other players and participate to Social Events which will take place regularly to win extra rewards.

paragraphs.1: Throughout the Alpha Season, explore the Metaverse to complete objectives and earn great rewards - 7 exclusive to the Alpha Season NFT and
paragraphs.3: The Alpha Season includes over nine hundred new NFTs! Everything you can see in the game can be purchased in the Sandbox Marketplace.

rewards.title: All about the rewards
rewards.paragraph: How does it work, what can we do and what do we earn? We tell you everything!

reward.title: Reward
reward.subtitle: +1.000 Sand
reward.paragraph1: The total price pool is 1M SAND!
reward.paragraph2: Each player can win up to 1,000 SAND. That is, there will be 1,000 winners!

explore.title: Explore our best levels
explore.subtitle: Everything you can see in the game can be purchased in the marketplace.

hub.paragraph: The Sandbox Hub is the central place of the Metaverse. You can find here a Gallery where many NTFs are exhibited, access portals to other experiences, a concert space as well as three areas inhabited by our factions: Oracles, Heroes and Scientists.

glitches.title: Glitches in the Metaverse
glitches.paragraph1: We don’t know yet what causes this, but you’ll frequently find Metaglitches, those little bits of other places of the Metaverse that spawn where they shouldn’t.
glitches.paragraph2: This is the opportunity to meet people and see NFTs that we don’t often meet!

author.text: ““I was looking for provisions for Carl and I arrived at this strange place … is it Altanta?””
author.name: Rick Grimes

modals.sandInfo: SAND operations require ETH for gas
modals.gasHelper: ETH will be used to pay the necessary amount of Gas, it will affect the price depending on the transaction speed.

modalVerifyEmail.emailRetry1: Email sent, please try again in
modalVerifyEmail.pleaseLogIn: Please login to request email verification.

lockedModal.title: Season Pass is locked
lockedModal.subTitle: You need to own the following NFTs to unlock the content
lockedModal.text1: Owning that NFTS unlocks the Season Pass Rewards.
lockedModal.text2: You need to keep it to continue enjoying this content, separating from the NFTs will cause you to lose access to the content.
lockedModal.text3: Some of them might be for sale on the marketplace depending on if some users are willing to part with it

lottery.description: Get 1 ticket by registering and another for each of the LAND that you own. The more tickets you have the greater your chances to win are!
lottery.tooltip: To participate you have to be a Land Owner.

currentBalance.noLandsText: You have lost the Land that allows you to enjoy all the Pre-Season content. You need to have a Land to unlock it

lotteryEnded.wantToJoin: Do you want to join to the season?
lotteryEnded.buySeasonPass: You can get the Season Pass if someone put it up for sale on OpenSea
lotteryEnded.descriptionExplore: Our first Season is ongoing now. You can explore and win rewards playing our experiences.
lotteryEnded.descriptionWinner: You won a Season Pass! Claim it now and hold on to it, the Alpha starts soon!
lotteryEnded.paragraphLooser: Don’t be too sad! You will still be able to access The Sandbox Hub and participate in Social Events to earn rewards.
lotteryEnded.descriptionLooser: You did not win a Season Pass, but perhaps one of the lucky winners is willing to sell theirs.

cannotPreRegister.title: Alpha Registration
cannotPreRegister.mustLandOwn: Only LAND owners can register for the closed Alpha.
cannotPreRegister.mustLandOwn2: Don’t worry, everybody will be welcome in the Metaverse soon!

noArtist.title: 크리에이터 펀드 계정이 없습니다
noArtist.text1: 현재 당사는 크리에이터 펀드 아티스트가 해당 상점에 자산을 업로드할 수 있도록 허용하고 있습니다.
noArtist.text2: 아래를 클릭하여 당사의 크리에이터 펀드에 대해 더 알아보세요.

suscribe.title: 트랜잭션 곧 출시
suscribe.text: 자산을 언제 구매 및 판매하는지에 대해 알아보시려면, 당사의 뉴스레터를 구독하실 수 있습니다.

SmurfGiveaway.title: The Sandbox ft. The Smurfs
SmurfGiveaway.desc: As a way to thank our loyal community who’s been contributing to The Sandbox since the very beginning, we’ll be giving away 1 Smurf NFT to ALL LAND owners.

GildedGiveaway.title: Here's your reward for staking SAND!
GildedGiveaway.desc: We have a special reward to thank those who joined our liquidity mining and staked SAND until January 25th. Enjoy this epic Gilded Mage NFT.
